testimonials.title: Young Person
testimonials.text: This is the only one that really considers the young person. All other systems are just about the data and aren't young person friendly.

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: I am already using the platform with my young people and they all love it.  Most of the time they don’t even realise that their session is about to end.

testimonials.title: Young Person
testimonials.text: I love that someone is finally using technology in CAMHS.

testimonials.title: Head of Primary Mental Health Services (CAMHS)
testimonials.text: We haven’t had anyone who doesn’t want to use IncludeME. Even parents are keen.

testimonials.title: Young Person
testimonials.text: It makes it easier having something else I can focus on, instead of awkwardly avoiding eye contact.

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: They don’t mind how many measures they have to do if it’s on IncludeME. Questionnaires seem less of a task and young people seem a lot more willing to fill them in this way.

testimonials.title: Young Person
testimonials.text: It helps balance out the flow of personal knowledge

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: I think you have hit on something that I think is the future of therapy

testimonials.title: Young Person
testimonials.text: This is what helps speed up different clinicians knowing [about me] and what I like

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: Allows more options for young people to be worked with in ways that works for them

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: IncludeME is the most user friendly system [here today]. No other system does outcome measures in such a young person friendly way.

testimonials.title: Clinician
testimonials.text: They come into my session and we introduce use the ipads and all of a sudden it is theirs, the power is back now, there is the autonomy there. They are talking about their therapy and how they want it. So it is really really empowering.
